name: Anchor (beta)
description: The unit appears attached to the bottom of the page. Upon initiation, the unit expands upwards to reveal client messaging, overlapping the site.

name: Sliver
description: The unit appears at the top of the page above site content. Upon initiation, the unit expands vertically to reveal client messaging, pushing down the site.

name: Interstitial (beta)
description: The unit appears upon page load or when an user clicks on a link. Upon initiation, the unit lightboxes over the site to reveal client messaging.

name: Overlay (beta)
description: This unit appears within the site's content. Upon initiation, the unit lightboxes to a larger unit to reveal client messaging.
